subject: newbie - how to test clases persisting to DB, mock objects in .net
msgSnippet: Hi, I started writing some tests for my app in C#, and I am using NUnit (hope it s OK to post here, NUnit is just a transcript of JUnit). My problem is that
messageBody:
Hi,

I started writing some tests for my app in C#, and I am using NUnit (hope it's OK to post here, NUnit is just a transcript of JUnit).
My problem is that when I test code that ends up modifying a DB, I need to restore DB every time I finish my tests and that is not allways possible and it takes time.
Is there other way to do this, like using mock objects. I started constructing DataSets from code, but needs really lot of code ant that's getting tedious.
Any suggestions?

Danijel Arsenovski
www.refactorizacion.com;
www.teslateam.com
